thread.title: Omatic Software to Present Newest Innovations as a Platinum Sponsor of the World’s Largest Nonprofit Conference
thread.title_full: Omatic Software to Present Newest Innovations as a Platinum Sponsor of the World’s Largest Nonprofit Conference

author: Caroline Stallings
title: Omatic Software to Present Newest Innovations as a Platinum Sponsor of the World’s Largest Nonprofit Conference
text:
Omatic Software, a Blackbaud Technology Partner, Microsoft Certified Partner, and leading provider of software and services for nonprofits, is proud to be a Platinum sponsor and exhibitor at bbcon 2015, the premier event for nonprofit professionals. Now in its 16th year, bbcon 2015 will host thousands of attendees to share and learn the latest insights, trends, and innovations for a variety of topics including fundraising, technology, marketing, accounting, and much more. Omatic Software will be exhibiting at booth #801 demonstrating time-saving tools aimed at helping nonprofits save and raise more money with its integration and data hygiene tools for Raiser’s Edge™. In addition to exhibiting, Omatic Software will lead three sessions on the agenda and co-present a fourth.
“bbcon 2015 is the event of the year for Blackbaud partners and users, and we wouldn’t miss it,” said Jeff Montgomery, the founder of Omatic Software. “This year we will be showcasing our newest innovations with ImportOmatic® 3 to integrate Raiser’s Edge and Raiser’s Edge NXT™ with nearly any other system, MergeOmatic for duplicate record identification and merging in Raiser’s Edge, and ScoreOmatic to score constituents using any Raiser’s Edge data to determine affinity, engagement, or anything else you can think of.”
Montgomery also implied that there will be something unusual and exciting in the booth this year. “The Omatic booth will have a feature that you won’t want to miss,” hinted Montgomery.
Learn more about Omatic Software at http://www.OmaticSoftware.com and for more information on bbcon 2015 visit http://www.bbconference.com .
About Omatic Software
Omatic Software, named to Inc. Magazine’s Inc.5000-America’s Fastest Growing Private Companies list for the last four consecutive years, provides software and services that help nonprofit organizations excel. The company provides a diverse set of software solutions—including products that enhance and extend the Blackbaud portfolio, and also more custom development options for organizations with unique needs—and also offers strategic services delivered by nonprofit experts to help clients get the most out of their technology platform. Founded in 2002, Omatic Software has provided thousands of leading nonprofits with innovative tools to eliminate manual processes; resulting in significant time and cost savings. For more information on Omatic Software, visit http://www.omaticsoftware.com , call (888) 662-8426 or email info(at)omaticsoftware(dot)com.
